amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate regarding tax relief to encourage charitable giving incentives.

vote.text: Amendment SA 163 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 163 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Santorum. (consideration: CR S2941-2942; text: CR S2942) To express the sense of the Senate regarding tax relief to encourage charitable giving incentives.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 163 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 163 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Santorum.
